item.title: Tail call optimization in Scala
item.author: sec.gary@gmail.com (GaryZhu)
item.description: Recursion provides us a clean way to solve some problems. But one drawback of it is the memory cost caused by the recursion call stack, which could be critical for memory sensitive applications like mobile ones.
